express.title: Express & Middleware
express.description: Our guest Jon Ballands chats with us about the IBM Swift Sandbox, and building it with Node & Express.

ember.title: Ember
ember.description: With frameworks being so hot right now, we talk to Iheanyi Ekechukwu about Ember

react.title: React
react.description: This week we talk about React and why it's so darn hard to get started with!

devtools.title: Chrome DevTools
devtools.description: Chrome DevTools is the topic of the week, which we've simply deemed "awesome".

preprocessors.title: CSS Processors
preprocessors.description: This week's episode is about the past, present and future of CSS Pre and Post-processors.

remote-collaboration.title: Remote Collaboration
remote-collaboration.description: Absence makes the heart grow fonder? Let's talk about remote collaboration and the tools that make it possible.

dev-environment.title: Developer Environment
dev-environment.description: Sublime or Atom? Wait, WEBSTORM? We talk about our favourite developer environment tips and tricks.

styleguides-at-scale.title: Styleguides at Scale
styleguides-at-scale.description: We discuss the challenges of creating scalable styleguides with guest Brian Han

learning-tools.title: Learning Tools
learning-tools.description: College? Where we're going, we don't need college (or do we?).

module-loaders.title: Module Loaders
module-loaders.description: We'll talk about modules and module loaders! Everything from AMD to common.js and spend a bit of time going over Browserify and Webpack.

task-runners.title: Task Runners
task-runners.description: Grunt, Gulp, Broccoli, Brunch, Mimosa, oh my! So many task runners, so little time. In this weeks episode, we explore each of these delectable breakfast items/task runners.
